sections.Season 3 filming:
* '''4 July 2012''': George R.R. Martin has confirmed that Daenerys Targaryen's storyline in [[Slaver's Bay]] will be filmed in Morocco.<ref>[http://winteriscoming.net/2012/07/new-location-details-for-croatia-and-morocco/ ]</ref>
* '''9 July 2012''': Filming of Season 3 begins.<ref>[http://winteriscoming.net/2012/06/season-three-to-start-filming-july-9th/ ]</ref> Daniel Minahan is directing the first episode to be filmed, but it is also revealed that [[Clive Mantle]] will not be reprising his role of the [[Greatjon Umber]].<ref>[http://winteriscoming.net/2012/07/filming-on-season-three-begins-today/ ]</ref> [[Liam Cunningham]] signs a six-year contract to reprise his role of [[Davos Seaworth]], suggesting that HBO envisage the series lasting as long as eight seasons.<ref>[http://www.independent.ie/lifestyle/independent-woman/celebrity-news-gossip/liam-cunningham-signs-up-for-next-six-series-of-game-of-thrones-3162227.html The Irish Independent]</ref>
* '''13 July 2012''': To San Diego Comic Con confirmed HBO 14 new castmembers:<ref>[http://gameofthrones.wikia.com/wiki/User_blog:Opark_77/Comic_con_casting_cavalcade Comic con casting cavalcade]</ref>
**[[Clive Russell]] as [[Brynden Tully]].
**[[Nathalie Emmanuel]] as [[Missandei]].
**[[Mackenzie Crook]] as [[Orell]].
**[[Kerry Ingram]] as [[Shireen Baratheon]]
**[[Thomas Brodie-Sangster]] as [[Jojen Reed]].
**[[Ellie Kendrick]] as [[Meera Reed]].
**[[Richard Dormer]] as [[Beric Dondarrion]].
**[[Paul Kaye]] as [[Thoros of Myr]].
**[[Diana Rigg]] as [[Olenna Redwyne]].
**[[Kristofer Hivju]] as [[Tormund Giantsbane]].
**[[Philip McGinley]] as [[Anguy]].
**[[Tara Fitzgerald]] as [[Selyse Baratheon]].
**[[Tobias Menzies]] as [[Edmure Tully]].
**[[Anton Lesser]] as [[Qyburn]].
* '''27 July 2012''': After several days of speculation, [[Iwan Rheon]] is confirmed to have been cast in the role of 'Boy'.<ref>[http://www.westeros.org/GoT/News/Entry/HBO_Confirms_Iwan_Rheon_Casting/ Westeros.org]</ref>
* '''28 July 2012''': ''Game of Thrones'' wins Program of the Year at the [[wikipedia:Television Critics Association Awards|Television Critics Associaton Awards]].<ref>[http://watching-tv.ew.com/2012/07/29/tca-awards-television-critics-breaking-bad-game-of-thrones/ Entertainment Weekly]</ref>
* '''10 September 2012''': It is confirmed that the Moroccan leg of filming will take place in the coastal city of [[wikipedia:Essaouira|Essaouira]].<ref>[http://wicnet.tumblr.com/post/31147370790/a-casting-call-for-extras-has-revealed-that-the ]</ref>
* '''16 September 2012''': The second season of ''Game of Thrones'' wins six awards at the [[wikipedia:Creative Arts Emmy Award|Creative Arts Emmy Awards]]:<ref>[http://www.westeros.org/GoT/News/Entry/Game_of_Thrones_Wins_Big_at_Creative_Arts_Emmys/ Westeros.org]</ref>
**Outstanding Achievement in Art Direction for a Single-Camera Series. 
**Outstanding Costumes for a Series.
**Outstanding Achievement in Makeup for a Single-Camera Series (Non-Prosthetic).
**Outstanding Visual Effects; Outstanding Sound Editing for a Series.
